features: Wall-to-wall vision incorporates optimal optics in a low-profile frame that utilizes 40% thinner face foam for an ultra-close fit
Triple-layer face foam features two layers of foam, including a slightly denser layer closest to the face, and a layer of moisture-wicking fleece for a snug seal and comfortable fit
Thermoplastic polyurethane frame is durable and lightweight but remains flexible in cold weather
MFI® technology(Magnetic Face Mask Integration)uses magnetic connection to quickly seal your face mask to your goggles without obstructing ventilation for a gapless setup that seals out the elements
Over the Glass compatible frame designed to accommodate prescription eyewear underneath the goggles
Bonus lens and microfiber goggle bag included
Magna-Tech® quick lens change technology uses magnets for a seamless and secure lens-to-frame seal that makes for easy lens changes and unsurpassed lens retention
Perceive lens provides high-contrast vision and terrain defining clarity in just about any light condition
Spheric Injected Lens design mimics the curvature of the human eye for enhanced clarity
A hydrophobic and oleophobic coating provides unmatched smudge, scratch, and moisture resistance on the outer lens surface for clear optics and easy cleaning
Integral Clarity Technology Anti-Fog exceeds basic anti-fog treatment standards, delivering crystal clear vision that lasts for an extended period of time
Outlast® Fog Management Face Fleece absorbs, stores, and releases heat to control moisture inside the goggles and provide a higher level of anti-fog
No-slip silicone strap keeps the goggles in place so riders can focus on the terrain
Full perimeter vent channel maximizes airflow to bring fresh air in, and move hot air and moisture out, for clear vision
